content.raw:
Have we had an official release of ign-cmake1 yet? If so, we should definitely bump the major version when increasing the minimum required cmake.

If we haven't had an official release of ign-cmake1, then we should probably still consider bumping the major version if we intend to have a release of the `default` branch before we merge the `gz11` branch into it.
content.html:
Have we had an official release of ign-cmake1 yet? If so, we should definitely bump the major version when increasing the minimum required cmake.

If we haven't had an official release of ign-cmake1, then we should probably still consider bumping the major version if we intend to have a release of the default branch before we merge the gz11 branch into it.
